Affliction.name: Bloodlust
Affliction.description: Gotta go fast.

Affliction.name: Killer Resistance OASIS
Affliction.description: Prevents cheap death.

Affliction.name: TITAN Healing
Affliction.description: Passive healing.

Affliction.name: Radiation Precursor
Affliction.description: Used to manage the spread of radiation.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of radiation sickness.

Affliction.name: Lobotomized
Affliction.description: There's no humanity left behind the patient's eyes.

Affliction.name: New Identity
Affliction.description: Your identity has changed.

Affliction.name: Identity Change
Affliction.description: Your identity is changing.

Affliction.name: Combat Enhancements
Affliction.description: Subject heals slightly faster than the normal person but is more susceptible to occult attacks.

Affliction.name: Team Change (Coalition)
Affliction.description: Your team is changing.

Affliction.name: Loadout Change (Coalition)
Affliction.description: Your loadout is changing.

Affliction.name: Team Change (Jovian)
Affliction.description: Your team is changing.

Affliction.name: Loadout Change (Jovian)
Affliction.description: Your loadout is changing.

Affliction.name: Amphetamines
Affliction.description: The presence of amphetamines has increased the patient's heart rate along with their endurance.

Affliction.name: Adrenaline High
Affliction.description: The presence of adrenaline has increased the patient's heart rate along with their endurance.

Affliction.name: Tobacconade
Affliction.description: Finally, a drug that doesn't fucking kill you.

Affliction.name: Smelling Salts
Affliction.description: Smelling salts have increased the patient's alertness.

Affliction.name: Calomel Smelling Salts
Affliction.description: Smelling salts have increased the patient's alertness.
The patient is being punished.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been judged for your sins.

Affliction.name: Nails
Affliction.description: Metal nails are protruding from the victim's flesh.

Affliction.name: Tremor
Affliction.description: A powerful strike has caused the victim to violently shake, wreaking havoc with existing afflictions.

Affliction.name: Marked for Purification
Affliction.description: Thou shalt be purged.

Affliction.name: Fanatic
Affliction.description: Ready to Purify.

Affliction.name: Suit Pressurized
Affliction.description: The wearer's suit has achieved full body pressurization.

Affliction.name: Immolation
Affliction.description: The patient's skin is glowing from within and getting dangerously warm. You have a horrible feeling about this..
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been immolated.

Affliction.name: Crushing Force
Affliction.description: Pressure is building.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been crushed.

Affliction.name: Binding Spell
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of being cuffed.

Affliction.name: Flame Curse
Affliction.description: The patient's skin is glowing from within and getting dangerously warm. You have a horrible feeling about this..
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been immolated.

Affliction.name: Frost Curse
Affliction.description: The patient's skin is glowing from within and getting dangerously cold. You have a horrible feeling about this..
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have frozen to death.

Affliction.name: Malevolence Blast
Affliction.description: You have a horrible feeling about this..

Affliction.name: Irradiation
Affliction.description: Radiation levels are spiking rapidly in the patient's immediate vicinity. You have a horrible feeling about this..
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been killed by fatal radiation exposure.

Affliction.name: Static Blast
Affliction.description: The patient's skin is glowing from within and getting dangerously bright. You have a horrible feeling about this..
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been staticbombed.

Affliction.name: Static Buildup
Affliction.description: A static charge is beginning to build up.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been staticbombed.

Affliction.name: Blessed
Affliction.description: The patient has been blessed.

Affliction.name: Whispers
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been judged for your sins.

Affliction.name: Penance
Affliction.description: The patient is being punished.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been judged for your sins.

Affliction.name: Expeditious Penance
Affliction.description: The patient is being punished.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been judged for your sins.

Affliction.name: Hollow
Affliction.description: A portion or the entirety of the patient's soul is missing.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You sold your soul, and now you will never find peace.

Affliction.name: Cultist's Offering
Affliction.description: This is a price for power.

Affliction.name: Condemned
Affliction.description: A supernatural force is negatively affecting the patient due to the lack of a soul.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been judged for your sins.

Affliction.name: Blindness
Affliction.description: The patient has been blinded by a flashbang.

Affliction.name: Blindness
Affliction.description: The patient has been blinded by a smoke bomb.

Affliction.name: Coughing
Affliction.description: The patient is breathing chemical smoke, causing them to cough violently.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to gas-induced respiratory failure.

Affliction.name: Neurotoxin Manager
Affliction.description: The patient is afflicted with a deadly neurotoxin. If they are not quickly treated, they may die.

Affliction.name: Neurotoxin
Affliction.description: The patient is afflicted with a deadly neurotoxin. If they are not quickly treated, they may die.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to neurotoxin-induced asphyxiation.

Affliction.name: Asphyxia
Affliction.description: The patient is afflicted with a deadly neurotoxin. If they are not quickly treated, they may die.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to neurotoxin-induced asphyxiation.

Affliction.name: Deal with the Devil
Affliction.description: You made a deal with the devil. Is the power worth it?
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You made a bad deal.

Affliction.name: Consequences
Affliction.description: You made a deal with the devil. Is the power worth it?
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You made a bad deal.

Affliction.name: Unkillable
Affliction.description: FEAR MY WRATH MORTAL!!!
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You strayed too close to the sun.

Affliction.name: Super Serum
Affliction.description: A concoction of drugs has made you the best a man can be.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You made a bad deal.

Affliction.name: Serum Consequences
Affliction.description: You made a deal with the devil. Is the power worth it?
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You made a bad deal.

Affliction.name: Swarm Feeder Implantation
Affliction.description: The patient is incubating a swarmfeeder, that will violently burst from their body and grow into a queen if left unchecked.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to an infestation of swarmfeeders.

Affliction.name: Swarm Resistance
Affliction.description: Prevents further bursting.

Affliction.name: Aging
Affliction.description: This swarmfeeder is maturing into a queen. Kill it before that happens.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to your internal injuries.

Affliction.name: Calyxanide Gas
Affliction.description: The patient is breathing calyxanide aerosol.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to gas-induced respiratory failure.

Affliction.name: Airborne Velonaceps Infection
Affliction.description: The patient has been exposed to air infected by an airborne strain of Velonaceps Calyx.

Affliction.name: Airborne Velonaceps Contagion
Affliction.description: A lingering cloud of husk gas clings to your clothes. Stay away from others and seek antibiotics.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to the husk contagion.

Affliction.description: A lingering cloud of husk gas clings to your clothes. Stay away from others.

Affliction.name: Airborne Husk Mutation
Affliction.description: Mutates the affected husks.

Affliction.name: Airborne Husk Fortification
Affliction.description: Empowers the husks affected.

Affliction.name: Airborne Velonaceps Manager
Affliction.description: The patient has been exposed to air infected by an airborne strain of Velonaceps Calyx.

Affliction.name: Frozen
Affliction.description: The area is pale and cold, and the patient is losing feeling in the area.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have frozen to death.

Affliction.name: Frostbite
Affliction.description: The patient's blood and soft tissue has begun to crystallize, resulting in severe tissue damage.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have frozen to death.

Affliction.name: Windchill
Affliction.description: The cold air has chilled the patient to the bone. Reach shelter ASAP.

Affliction.name: Waterborne Frostbite
Affliction.description: Frigid water soaks the patient and their clothes. Drying them off ASAP is advised.

Affliction.name: Healing Gas
Affliction.description: An infusion of aerosolized Pomegrenade Extract is recovering the patient's many wounds.

Affliction.name: Warmth Infusion
Affliction.description: The patient's cells are recovering from the damaging effects of frostbite.

Affliction.name: Fortified
Affliction.description: The patient is especially resistant against incoming damage.

Affliction.name: Husk Fortified
Affliction.description: The patient is especially resistant against incoming damage and husk cures.

Affliction.name: Hydrated
Affliction.description: The patient is hydrated.

Affliction.name: Snacks
Affliction.description: The patient's hunger is satisfied, but only briefly.

Affliction.name: Rations
Affliction.description: The patient's hunger is satisfied, but at what cost?

Affliction.name: Meal
Affliction.description: The patient's hunger is satisfied due to a healthy meal.

Affliction.name: Husk Ally
Affliction.description: Invisible to monsters while above 50% husk.

Affliction.name: Hunger
Affliction.description: You're starving.

Affliction.name: Full
Affliction.description: You don't feel like you could eat another bite..

Affliction.name: Food Poisoning
Affliction.description: The patient's stomach is quickly rejecting its contents.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died from food poisoning.

Affliction.name: Honkmother's Grace
Affliction.description: The Honkmother protects.

Affliction.name: Father's Curse
Affliction.description: The patient is suffering from a potent curse.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to dark powers beyond your comprehension.

Affliction.name: Calyx's Curse
Affliction.description: The patient is suffering from a potent curse.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to dark powers beyond your comprehension.

Affliction.name: Raptorbane
Affliction.description: The patient is breathing raptorbane aerosol, causing mild irritation.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to gas-induced respiratory failure.

Affliction.name: Melting
Affliction.description: The patient is covered in sulphuric acid.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have melted to death.

Affliction.name: Genetic Flaying
Affliction.description: The patient's genetic structures are breaking down and reforming rapidly.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to mass organ failure caused by genetic flaying.

Affliction.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Stage 1
Affliction.description: The patient is showing signs of infection with Hyperius Asperivirus, experiencing symptoms such as laboured breathing, extreme coughing fits and gastrointestinal inflammation. In its current state, it is highly dangerous and infectious.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to the Hyperius Asperivirus.

Affliction.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Precursor
Affliction.description: An affliction for handling the infection.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to the Hyperius Asperivirus.

Affliction.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Stage 2
Affliction.description: The patient is currently recovering from the affects of Hyperius Asperivirus.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to the Hyperius Asperivirus.

Affliction.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Immunity
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits complete, but temporary, immunity to Hyperius Asperivirus.

Affliction.name: Husk Stabilizer
Affliction.description: The injected husk is immune to decay.

Affliction.name: Airborne Infection Immunity (Permanent)
Affliction.description: This person is immune to zombification.

Affliction.name: Airborne Infection Immunity (Temporary)
Affliction.description: This person is (temporarily) immune to zombification.

Affliction.name: Regenerative Parasite
Affliction.description: The patient is infected with a parasite that stimulates their natural regeneration, though once they enter critical condition it will consume their organs.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to your infection

Affliction.name: Viral Numbing
Affliction.description: The patient's nerves have suffered permanent damage due to an infection of some kind, they are incapable of feeling their injuries until it's too late.
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: Died due to a lack of pain receptors.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were killed by being unable to feel your injuries.

Affliction.name: Numbing Recovery
Affliction.description: The patient's nervous system is recovering from damage.

Affliction.name: Butchered
Affliction.description: Any useful flesh has been surgically removed from this creature.

Affliction.name: Payout
Affliction.description: You can receive your paycheck now.

Affliction.name: Trotsky Power
Affliction.description: The Trotsky's stupidity empowers you.

Affliction.name: Trotsky's Hatred
Affliction.description: The Trotsky's stupidity curses you.

Affliction.name: Ignition
Affliction.description: boil inshallah

Affliction.name: Cursed Flame
Affliction.description: This is your reckoning.

Affliction.name: Encumbered
Affliction.description: You have become encumbered from carrying too many items.

Affliction.name: DANGER
Affliction.description: Something is coming.

Affliction.name: Swarmfed
Affliction.description: Preparing to multiply.

Affliction.name: Cum Ingestion
Affliction.description: The patient has swallowed an insane amount of practically ancient cum. Doom is certain if an antidote is not swiftly prepared..

Affliction.name: FAST FAST FAST FAST
Affliction.description: The patient has supersonic abilities.

Affliction.name: Hypervigor
Affliction.description: Greatly reduces overall damage taken and increases melee attack damage for 5 minutes. (Buffs decrease linearly.)

Affliction.name: Jerry Paranoia
Affliction.description: The patient feels cold to touch and frequently stares at most advertisements.

Affliction.name: Jerry Mentality
Affliction.description: The patient mutters to themselves about buying more products in an effort to 'prepare for the worst.'

Affliction.name: Jerry Insanity
Affliction.description: Patient is inconsolable and shakes frequently. Constantly mutters about an unknown threat.
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: The head twists upwards, with an unhinged smile.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have properly prepared for your end.

Affliction.name: Jerroid Side Effect
Affliction.description: The patient appears nominal, but scanning yields an build-up of Compound J.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: Blew up and died.

Affliction.name: Jerroid Explosive Effects
Affliction.description: The patient appears nominal, but scanning yields an build-up of Compound J.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: Blew up and died.

Affliction.name: Glory and Discipline
Affliction.description: For glory and discipline! 20% faster repairs, and 10% more vitality and movement speed.

Affliction.name: Medical Training
Affliction.description: The Captain has personally trained you in basic medical procedures. +20 Medical Skill and 25% more effective CPR.

Affliction.name: Weaponry Training
Affliction.description: The Coalition trained you in how to operate some of the most common weaponry on Europa. +20 Weapons Skill.
